text: Münchberg is a small town in Upper Franconia (Bavaria), Germany. It is sometimes known as the Textile Town of Bavaria. Its sister city is Jefferson City, Missouri, United States. ==Geography== ===The town districts=== * Ahornis * Biengarten * Gottersdorf * Grund * Hilbrandsgrün * Jehsen * Laubersreuth * Laubersreuth * Markersreuth * Maxreuth * Mechlenreuth * Neutheilung * Meierhof * Mussen * Pulschnitzberg * Plösen * Poppenreuth * Sauerhof * Schlegel * Schödlas * Schotteneinzel * Schweinsbach * Solg * Straas * Unfriedsdorf ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Hof (district)
title: Münchberg
